name: Bombardier Transportation
goal: BT is an innovative, high-quality rail systems integrator and services provider, with a focus on modular, standardized platforms and a selective market approach, generating profitable, sustainable growth. We deliver on time while making an optimal use of our resources, being right the first time as per customer and regulatory expectations thanks to an engaged, enabled, qualified and flexible workforce.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU initiatives, policies and legislative files related to railway transportation industry, including but not limited to Transposition of 4th Railway Package and Brexit.
Competitiveness of the European rail industry,
